data: {"generalSituation":"The band of clouds covering the coast of Guangdong will thin out in the next couple of days. The weather will improve with temperatures rising progressively over the region. However, it will remain cool in the morning. Under the persistent influence of the dry northeast monsoon and its replenishment, the weather will be generally fine over the coast of southern China early to midweek next week. The temperature difference between day and night will be rather large.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251121","week":"Friday","forecastWind":"North to northeast force 4.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy at first. Cool in the morning.
